column4: ekiga is able to display pictures from my webcam, but i don't know which /dev to use for mplayer, how do i find it?
er... what i mean is that i have ekiga, and that i am using it to display video from my webcam.  i'd like to use mplayer, but i have to specify the device in /dev/something
how do i find out which /dev/* ekiga is using?
look at some config file on the ./ekiga folder
not sure where it might be
this looks like program settings, which widgets are set and stuff
look up in a config file where the /dev is pointing to
i don't know what "a config file" to look in
all the ones under ~/.gconf/apps/ekiga/* don't seem to have it
not quite in the help file either
